name: Reza's Story
description:
Reza has gone missing and left pieces of a letter she received behind. Talk to their friends and figure out what happened.

Controls:  

- Nod and shake your head with the mouse to respond to questions and dialogue.

- Alternatively, press 1 for nod and 2 for shake.

- Press E to interact with objects and further the dialogue.

- WASD to move, Shift to sprint, Spacebar to jump.

Credits:

Any feedback will be appreciated.
